scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two male figures standing, with a third figure lying prostrate on the ground. The figure on the left is dressed as a bishop, wearing a mitre and ornate vestments, and holding a crozier. He gestures with his left hand. The figure on the right, who appears younger and wears a halo, holds a bundle of arrows. The fallen figure is dressed in green and orange. The background is a stylized landscape with mountains and a blue sky with clouds. The scene is framed by decorative borders.
